title: Dark Forest Theme
description: A mystical dark forest theme with deep greens and shadows. Perfect for nature enthusiasts and adventurers.

title: Ocean Breeze Theme
description: A calming ocean breeze theme featuring serene blues and waves. Ideal for coastal living and beach lovers.

title: Mountain Escape Theme
description: A tranquil mountain escape theme with earthy tones and majestic landscapes. Great for those seeking peace and seclusion.

title: Urban Cityscape Theme
description: A dynamic urban cityscape theme showcasing vibrant city lights and modern architecture. Perfect for city dwellers and nightlife enthusiasts.
